content.query:
use globalmart
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE orders_by_year_and_month
with(
    LOCATION = 'aggregated_data2/',
    DATA_SOURCE = data_source_1,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
)  
AS
SELECT 
    YEAR(CAST(order_approved_at AS DATE)) AS year,
    MONTH(CAST(order_approved_at AS DATE)) AS month,
    count(distinct(order_id)) as CountOfOrders
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://miniproject3msktred.dfs.core.windows.net/globalmartdata/Orders_1.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [r]
group by YEAR(CAST(order_approved_at AS DATE)),MONTH(CAST(order_approved_at AS DATE))
order by YEAR(CAST(order_approved_at AS DATE)),MONTH(CAST(order_approved_at AS DATE))
GO
select * from orders_by_year_month
